summary: JUST AFTER BUYING MY 08 ACADIA EVERYTHING ON IT WENT WRONG. BUT NOW 2 HALF YEARS LATER AND ONLY 13000 MILES I CANT TAKE ANYMORE. THE SUNROOF HAS LEAKED SINCE WE BOUGHT IT. I HARDLY EVER DRIVE IT DUE TO THE LEAK AND THE  NOISE THE STEERING MAKES. RETURNED TO DEALER . THEY SAID DRAIN TUBES CLOGGED. STILL LEAKED. CARRIED TO BODY SHOP THEY SAID SAME THING. FIXED AGAIN. STILL LEAKS. CALLED GM DEALER TODAY SAID THEY CANT FIX IT.THEY SAID TO CALL BODY SHOP I JUST GOT IT BACK FROM. THEY SAID THAT IS WHO THEY WOULD CARRY IT TOO. I CAN ONLY ASSUME THAT I HAVE MOLD ISSUES. I CAN ONLY ASSUME MY AIRBAGS WONT WORK. I ALSO FIGURE WITH ALL THE WIRING WET ANYTHING COULD HAPPEN. I PROMISE WHEN SOMETHING HAPPENS TO MY FAMILY DUE TO THIS CAR GM WILL PAY. I WILL MAKE IT MY LIFE WORK TO MAKE THEM PAY.   *TR
